name: AI Visibility
description: Measures how prominently your brand appears in AI-generated responses from ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity.

insights.title: Strong ChatGPT Presence
insights.description: Your brand is mentioned in 68% of relevant ChatGPT responses for your core product category.

insights.title: Growing Perplexity Citations
insights.description: Perplexity cites your content as a source in 45% of industry-related queries, up from 28% last month.

insights.title: Featured in Comparison Queries
insights.description: When users ask AI 'best tools for X', your brand appears in 7 out of 10 responses.

issues.title: Weak Gemini Visibility
issues.description: Your brand only appears in 23% of Gemini responses, significantly lagging competitors.

issues.title: Incorrect Information in AI Responses
issues.description: AI models are citing outdated pricing and feature information from 2023.

issues.title: Missing from 'How-to' Queries
issues.description: Despite strong tutorial content, AI rarely cites your how-to guides.

recommendations.description: Create more structured, factual content that aligns with Gemini's preference for authoritative sources.
Ensure pricing, features, and company info are current and prominently structured.
Add clear step numbers, summaries, and FAQ schema to how-to content.
